attributes.action: Start recording the rate of suicides & open verdicts of ex British Servicemen.
attributes.additional_details:
See half way down page two starting with: “I can confirm…”

https://www.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/324458/PUBLIC_1403616620.pdf
attributes.background: The US have a public record of the suicide rate amongst their Veterans. In the UK we have no record. It is a matter of public interest that a record is kept regarding the post-service conduct of former servicemen and women. No record on suicides or open verdicts seems more than a little uncaring.
